data.name: Omega Sentinel
data.description: A merciless Orchis soldier, Omega Sentinel is a human who gave her body to technology and soul to the destruction of Mutantkind.

starItems.name: Omega Sentinel
starItems.description: A merciless Orchis soldier, Omega Sentinel is a human who gave her body to technology and soul to the destruction of Mutantkind.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

Counterattack breaks this chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>0%</color> of this character's Max Health

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>0%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Turn and each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally's Turn, Heal self and each <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally's Health is full, instead, Barrier that ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemy Turn End, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Death, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, for each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
On Turn and each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally's Turn, Heal self and each <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally's Health is full, instead, Barrier that ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemy Turn End, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

On Death, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, for each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, lower the Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

3.description:
On Turn and each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally's Turn, Heal self and each <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally's Health is full, instead, Barrier that ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemy Turn End, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

On Death, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > For each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies, enemy characters cannot gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

4.description:
On Turn and each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally's Turn, Heal self and each <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally's Health is full, instead, Barrier that ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemy Turn End, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

On Death, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies, enemy characters cannot gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
 > For each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, attack the most injured enemy for an additional +<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage

5.description:
On Turn and each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally's Turn, Heal self and each <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally's Health is full, instead, Barrier that ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemy Turn End, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage instead.

On Death, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies, enemy characters cannot gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
 > If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > For each summoned <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
